title: GET_VEHICLE_IS_MERCENARY
content:
0xD4C4642CB7F50B5D0x575504DE// GetVehicleIsMercenary
BOOL GET_VEHICLE_IS_MERCENARY(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to check for mercenary status.Returns: Returns true if the vehicle is a mercenary vehicle, false otherwise.Returns whether the specified vehicle is designated as a mercenary vehicle
codeBlocks:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for GET_VEHICLE_IS_MERCENARY
GetVehicleIsMercenary(vehicle)
